topic.title: informatica-public
topic.shortdesc: Some project code written during my master degree study at University of Bologna.

li.p: CCS: A formalization of process algebra CCS in HOL4 (MSC exam project)

ul.li: CCS2: Further formalization of process algebra CCS in HOL4 (tirocinio)
FOOL: A bytecode compiler and interpreter for FOOL+ language (ASP exam project)
cryptanalysis: Differential cryptanalysis on DES (reduced to 4 rounds)
lambek: Formalized Lambek Calculus in HOL4
